thread.title: SpeedWeed Forms Strategic Partnership With HelloMD To Offer Instant Access To Medical Marijuana Prescriptions
thread.title_full: SpeedWeed Forms Strategic Partnership With HelloMD To Offer Instant Access To Medical Marijuana Prescriptions - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: SpeedWeed Forms Strategic Partnership With HelloMD To Offer Instant Access To Medical Marijuana Prescriptions
text:
SpeedWeed
On The Heels of Being Named The Most Visited Site in the Cannabis Sector By Awesomepova, the Largest Medical Marijuana Delivery Service Surges Forward
LOS ANGELES , Sept. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- SpeedWeed, California's largest, most experienced and fastest growing medical marijuana delivery service has entered into a strategic partnership with HelloMD , a service that connects members to doctors who can authorize their recommendation and allow them to get their legal marijuana prescription via online video consultations.
The partnership, the first of its kind, is focused on convenience and patient privacy. By leveraging technology, the HelloMD telehealth platform has been seamlessly integrated into SpeedWeed's proprietary software. Patients who visit SpeedWeed.com can, via HelloMD, consult immediately with a doctor and, if qualified, receive or renew their medical marijuana recommendation online without ever leaving their home.
"We have many patients who simply cannot leave their homes and many others who do not wish to visit a storefront dispensary. HelloMD recognizes that these patients should be able to speak to a qualified physician," says AJ Gentile, CEO, SpeedWeed . "We have built a reputation for convenience and privacy. The HelloMD network of physicians share these values. It's a perfect alignment of two companies with similar mission statements : to provide fast, easy, and discreet access to medical marijuana."
"We are excited to partner with an industry leader and a business so equally passionate about helping those in need," says Mark Hadfield , CEO of HelloMD . "In so many ways SpeedWeed is the ideal partner for HelloMD. Its proven expertise in delivery is a valuable service to all new and existing medical marijuana patients alike, many of whom have difficulty or prefer not to leave their homes to visit a dispensary. The combination of an online doctors consultation, with easy and fast delivery is a game changer for this growth industry."
Now covering a 6,000 square mile radius and serving 26,000 patients, SpeedWeed has quickly emerged as a leader in the fastest growing industry in America. Most recently, Awesomepova Research did a report on the relative popularity of software applications and website metrics in the cannabis sector, the metric of "Daily Views vs. Time on Site" shows SpeedWeed as the top ranked cannabis site in America.
About SpeedWeed
SpeedWeed is California's largest, fastest growing medical marijuana delivery service. Based on the business model of fast, safe, discreet and legal on-demand cannabis delivery, SpeedWeed has grown for 25 consecutive months with revenue of over $6.3 million to date. Launched in 2011 as a three-person operation, the company now boasts 70 full time employees including a fleet of over 50 drivers. SpeedWeed is on pace to realize $5.5 million revenue in 2016 and is presently expanding into other cities and states. For more information about SpeedWeed , click HERE .
About HelloMD
HelloMD is the leading digital healthcare platform for medical cannabis patients. They provide easy, convenient online video access to physicians for medical cannabis consultations, recommendations to qualifying patients, product advise and more. For more information about HelloMD, click HERE .
